resources.string: Shabbat Candle-lighting for Buenos Aires for %1s
Baruch a-ta A-do-nay Elo-hei-nu me-lech ha-o-lam\na-sher ki-di-sha-nu bi-mitz-vo-tav vi-tzi-va-noo li-had-leek ner shel Sha-bat ko-desh.
Blessed are you, L‑rd our G‑d, King of the universe,\nwho has sanctified us with His commandments, and commanded us to kindle the light of the Holy Shabbat.
This application uses the API from http://sunrise-sunset.org/api to retrieve the sunset time. This time minus 3 hours (time zone) and then minus 18 minutes.
